Opera Review At Webtools Com

09 Aug 1999

For all of you who do not use Opera, it is really time to check it out. I may not have the right to speak of it..I love this small, lighting-fast and clever browser. Ever tried to open 40 browser windows in IE4 or Netscape? For those of you who want to read more, take a look at the review of it here.
